---
id: providerSession
title: GAC Flow Provider Session
sidebar_label: Provider Session
---

```jsx live
 <GigyaContext
        domain="accounts.gigya.com"
        apiKey="3_VL0lfWLluGwf2VZ5niQd4Xx6HFf6hSdYHfHoDMJDF2njekgvaEbnxryRAsaXwZK2"> 
        <GigyaRequest
            api={"socialize.notifyLogin"}
            providerSessions={JSON.stringify({ 
                    testnetwork3:
                        {authToken: ""}
                })
            }>
            {response =>
                <GigyaRequest
                    api={"socialize.notifyLogin"}
                    authCode={response.cookieValue}
                    authMode="cookie" >
                    {response =>
                        <GigyaRequest
                            api={"socialize.getUserInfo"}
                            login_token={response.login_token}
                            authMode ="cookie"
                            enabledProviders= "*,testnetwork3"
                          />
                    }
                </GigyaRequest>
            }
        </GigyaRequest>
    </GigyaContext>

```
